# Project: MaterialReactTable Drag-and-Drop Demo

## Project Type
Vite + React + TypeScript with MaterialReactTable

## Dependencies
- material-react-table
- @mui/material
- @mui/icons-material
- @emotion/react
- @emotion/styled
- @dnd-kit/core

## Features
- Drag-and-drop row reordering
- Visual drop intent indicators (above, over, below)
- Material Design UI components
